code: import axios from'axios';const API=axios.create({baseURL:'https://library-backend-f9bh.onrender.com'});export const login=data=>API.post('/auth/login',data);export const register=data=>API.post('/users/register',data);export const getUser=username=>API.get("/users/".concat(username));export const getBooks=()=>API.get('/books/');export const reserveBook=(book_id,data)=>API.post("/books/".concat(book_id,"/reserve"),data);
